content.query:
-- type your sql script here, we now have intellisense
SELECT 
r.filename()  AS [filename]
, COUNT_BIG(*) AS [rows]
FROM OPENROWSET(
BULK'https://partystoragenortheurblob.blob.core.windows.net/csv/taxi/yellow_tripdata_2017-1*.csv',FORMAT='csv',FIRSTROW=2
)
WITH(
vendorid  INT,
picktime  DATETIME2,
tripds    FLOAT)
AS [r]
GROUP BY
r.filename()
ORDER BY
[filename]
